options: Have you heard any good rumors?
responses:
I hear that there is a very talented navigator in town, if you're in search of one. 
Only problem is that she recently lost someone and might not be up to sailing ever again.
Couldn't be better! Just another day in good ol' Dark Reef

options: Are you interested in joining my crew?
What are you doing at the bar in the middle of the day? Drinking your life away?
responses:
I do be lookin' for a new crew.
I can be a good First Mate if ye be needin' one.

I should ask you da same!
Careful with judgement young Captain, least ye be judged.

options: I know it's a bad time, but are you a navigator?
responses: What does it look like you fool? Leave me alone.
My dearest Betty, she was so young... * You notice the gravestone says 'Beatrice: Loving pet and friend' *
Uh, yes I am and I've been in search of a crew to go with. I lost Betty so suddenly, I'm not sure I could handle it right now...

options: Umm.. Would you like to join my crew?
responses:
I get it, I do be pretty scary lookin' after all.
Mistakes happen :)

Don't know, just woke up like this. 
Thank ya for getting that stone door open, but what do I do now?
Hell yes! I do be a good shipwright back when I be with the living.
You give each head a nice pet. Though it has three heads, it wags it's one tail.
Each head tries to get scratches at the same time. It's a mess, but they're very happy.

**BARK BARK**
You're not positive, but it sounds like the dog might want to be recruited...

We don't have any shipwrights in town, but there used to be a family of them.
You could check out their family crypt in the cemetery if you were so inclined.

Sorry, we don't have any beds available right now.
And don't you have a boat to sleep on anyways?

options: Have you heard of Captain Greenbeard?
Are you interested in joining my crew?
responses: Our old first mate left recently. I heard they were hanging around The Ugly Duckling.

Everyone in Dark Reef knows of Captain Greenbeard!
He used to be the greatest terror in the seas
No, I got meself a crew. Just hanging around here till we set off.

options: Why did you become a doctor?
Do you really need an apprentice?
responses: What? You look fine! Maybe drink more water instead of ale there Captain.
Why did you become a pirate? I'm really busy, maybe talk to someone else.

Not really. I took them in because their parents asked.
They're not that good, so maybe you could take them off my hands.

options: Do you have any sailing advice?
responses:
I heard that Captain GreenBeard has been dead for over 50 years.
No one has found his treasure in all that time.

I'm okay, but I could really use a new job.
This doctor is the only one in town and they aren't really known for their bedside manner.

I've heard you should have at least a navigator, a shipwright, and a first mate before setting sail.
It could be really dangerous otherwise.

I don't have much of a story, just trying to be a doctor I guess.
My parents sent me here to learn, but the doctor isn't very nice.
Gosh, I always wanted to be a pirate like you. Adventure, the Sea, Treasure.
You're living my dream mate.

Really!?! I'd kill for a chance to be on a pirate crew!
Wait, will I need to kill anyone?
I've heard there's a dog over at inn. I even heard it has three heads!

Hmmm, I'm not really getting anywhere with this cook job.
Ya know what! Yeah! Let's set sail Captain.
